data.text:
Hi, before we go into any matters of sort, I would like to explain that we are TWO people, we have been spiderman fans for a long time, now lets get into it.

As you may know, "Spiderman Unlimited" aired in 1999, when fox had the rights to this show, now that the rights have been given to Disney (Marvel in general), This show MIGHT have a chance of returning, If some of you didn't know, there was also another incident like this in "Dexter's Lab". there was a deleted episode titled "Dexter's rude removal" which was never shown on tv again, but however, with the fans binding together, they were able to reach out to adult swim and it was eventually released on youtube.

Now, we have even worse issues, As all you fans may know, Spiderman Unlimited Episode 13 ended us on one of the most tragic cliffhangers. We were eventuallty told that fox had cancelled this show in 2001 due to poor viewership and because of the popular shows like Pokemon and Digimon overshadowing this show, don't get me wrong, there were many good animated spiderman shows that were BETTER than this, but we spiderman fans really do crave an ending.

*Apparenty, according to my friend, season 2 had a script completed.

So support us and let's reach DISNEY!!

*In Australia, Foxtel channel, Disney XD - 705, correct me if im wrong with the channel number, Spider-Man unlimited is airing episodes sometimes MEANING that Disney has the rights to this show.

- Jack and Junior
